title: Executive Order 7685-Revocation of Executive Order No. 4699 of August 1, 1927, Withdrawing Public Lands
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, ch. 421, 36 Stat. 847, as amended by the act of August 24, 1912, ch. 369, 37 Stat. 497, Executive Order No. 4699 of August 1, 1927, withdrawing public lands in California pending resurvey, is hereby revoked.
This order shall become effective upon the date of the official filing of the plat of the resurvey of the said lands.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7685-Revocation of Executive Order No. 4699 of August 1, 1927, Withdrawing Public Lands Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/369003
